subject: Soccer
organizations: United States Men's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: Juergen Klinsmann checked off the first item on his to-do list as United States national team coach by releasing the roster he has selected for an exhibition game against Mexico in Philadelphia on Wednesday.
snippet: Juergen Klinsmann checked off the first item on his to-do list as United States national team coach by releasing the roster he has selected for an exhibition game against Mexico in Philadelphia on Wednesday.
